notes: One of its speeches, ''Mors Certa, Hora Certa'', is Latin for ''Death is certain, this hour surely''.<noinclude>{{JSpoiler|All players who sufficiently damage it during the last minute of the fight will receive the [[Slayer of Phrodomo]] [[achievement]].}}</noinclude>
sounds: Nothing is stronger than my pure hatred!
name: Phrodomo
behaviour: Phrodomo attacks the enemy with his strong melee until death.
location: [[Ghostlands]], behind the portal {{Mapper Coords|125.174|124.83|7|1|text=here}}, during the [[Rise of Devovorga]] [[World Quest]]. Can be fought on [[Vengoth]] during [[Devovorga's Essence Mini World Change]].
strategy: [[Physical]] resistant equipment such as [[Stone Skin Amulet]]s and [[Might Ring]]s are a good choice to bring along. It is a good idea to use [[Magic Wall]]s or [[Wild Growth]] runes to trap it. [[Fire Damage|Fire attacks]] work well so using [[Firebomb]]s and summoning [[Fire Elemental]]s can also help a lot. Smaller teams can expect a wait as this creature has a lot of [[health]]. [[Knight]]s can try to block it at level 170 or higher.
